Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: DAH7
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel by the pictures and the description on the Choice Hotels site. I was happy to see that when we arrived that it match the Choice Hotels site. The hotel was in a great location. The rooms were very clean. Breakfast was everything you could want.I like that it was a salt water pool and hot tub.The staff is very friendly and accompanied.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: William C
Reviews.Content: a #1 place to stay. friendly people, good swimming, hot tub inside great breakfast aera with good food reasonable price good location, easy to find. close to lots of attractions easy check in and easy check out.

Reviews.Title: “Not our first stay here, and it won't be our last.”
Reviews.Author: bransonlvr
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here several times, and always have a positive experience here. The rooms are clean and comfortable, the staff is friendly, and the beds are very comfortable. All of the things that are important to us. It is so conveniently located to everything we enjoy doing. We have tried other hotels in Branson to save a few bucks and have been OK with some, and some we were completely burned on. I have found that we always always have a positive experience with this hotel, and they always deliver what we need and expect.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, but not really above average”
Reviews.Author: Lacey S
Reviews.Content: Fairly nice hotel for such a busy location. I booked the hotel with reward points based solely on previous reviews. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The room was average, but clean. Hotel could use some updates in the bathroom, which was typical hotel tiny. There we're not enough towels or wash cloths in the room. The ones that were in the room were pretty worn. I would stay at this property again despite the lack of quality towels.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff, good rate, would stay again”
Reviews.Author: EuroShanny
Reviews.Content: I used hotel points to book this property, so I didn't know what to expect. I did know that it was one of the older Comfort Inns in Branson, as I have stayed at the others. I was pleasantly surprised to be upgraded to a suite room upon arrival (we were 3, so that was nice!). Although an older property, it is extreme well maintained, clean rooms, great breatkfast room with standard Comfort Inn full breakfast food, and although we didn't swim, the enclosed pool & hot tub looked great and it's open til 11pm. They do have older air-cons, so a little noisy, but didn't bother us. The location is perfect, right at the junction of Hwy 76 & the Red & Yellow Route, which allow you to beat the 76 traffic if you need to. The staff were overly friendly, helpful, and accommodating. We only stayed one night but actually wished we had booked one more! We will return to the Comfort Inn West.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised and very pleased with our stay”
Reviews.Author: KSMeadowlark
Reviews.Content: We visit Branson once or twice a year for the entertainment and shopping opportunities. Traveling with our dog, we usually stay at the Days Inn, La Quinta Inn or similar hotel that allows pets to stay. This trip, we were not traveling with our dog, so decided to stay in a little bit nicer hotel. We choose Comfort Inn and Suites West because of the convenient location. To be honest, I didn't expect that it would be much different than the Days Inn. I was pleasantly surprised. Check-in was fast and efficient. They had our reservations with all information accurate. The reception staff is very friendly and eager to please. Our room was very large and clean. The bed and pillows were wonderful. The towels were abundant, thick and soft. The room, not a suite, had a large TV, refrigerator, small coffee service and microwave. The bathroom had travel supplies such as shampoo and lotion. There is a "Breakfast Room" conveniently located near the main lobby. They provided the usual "continental" breakfast including coffee, juices (apple and orange), cereal including raisin bran, cheeries and fruitloops, skim and 2% milk, fresh fruit including bananas, apples and oranges, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, and waffles. They also provide 2 choices of scrambled eggs (with or without cheddar cheese), biscuits and gravy on one day, plus sausage and O'Brien potatoes the second day. (We were there only 2 days, so there may be other choices during the week.) It was a big selection for a free breakfast. The breakfast room was kept clean and well supplied by an attendant. There were lots of tables inside, plus a deck with extra tables outside. Also a large screen TV inside, plus USA Today was available inside. The facilities include a large swimming pool and hot tub enclosed in a building separate from the lobby area. The grounds are nicely maintained. I saw people sweeping up trash from the parking lot. You can tell that the management takes pride in maintaining their facility to a high standard. Check-out was just as efficient, plus they sent a "Thankyou" email for staying with them. That was a nice touch. We will definitely return. Just sad that they don't allow my well-behaved and exceedingly polite dog to stay.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT LOCATION & STAFF”
Reviews.Author: Melissa F
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for 5 nights for our vacation to Branson last week. My husband had accumulated rewards points on his credit card, so we decided to use them at this location. We were extremely pleased and had a wonderful experience! Check in was great, and the front desk clerks were so friendly and helpful. We asked for a King room and were given the King suite. The rooms were spotless! The beds were very comfortable. We only ate breakfast there our first morning, and we were the last in the building for the morning. Anything you could imagine was available! There is a separate indoor pool, that we never got the chance to use because we were on the go the entire time. This hotel has an exellent location, staff, and service!

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: 1beach-nut
Reviews.Content: Upon traveling midwestern states, my wife and I stayed at the Comfort Inn West in Branson for six days due to its location near Silver Dollar City and Shepherd of the Hills (one of the closest hotels to each), Pierce Arrow Show (about 1/2 mile) and the Sight and Sound Theatre (which is about 5 minutes away on the Expressway). The location is great for traveling around Branson. By using the Blue and Red routes, one can avoid traffic to reach other shows. The front desk will assist you with purchasing your tickets for most of the area shows at box office cost or less. They have available the Silver Dollar City 2 for 1 pass also. The rooms are very clean. They have a inside pool and hot tub. The hot breakfast varies daily and they have a hostess in the breakfast room during the breakfast hours to assist with any needs. Also, there is outside seating at the breakfast area to enjoy the early morning cool mountain air. Walking distance to many restaurants, IMAX and the Hank Williams, Jr. show. GREAT location!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Clean, Convenient”
Reviews.Author: ibtravlin60
Reviews.Content: Initially, we went in just to check rates with the thought of comparison shopping the price to other hotels nearby. However, the gentleman at the front desk, Daniel, was so friendly and personable that after a few minutes, we decided not to look any further. Great decision! Our room was spacious and clean, and the location was super convenient to so many things in Branson. As an added bonus, ALL of the employees we dealt with were helpful. They were always available to make suggestions, answer questions, or line up show tickets. Next trip to Branson, we know where we'll be staying!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Outdoorlovers9
Reviews.Content: My husband stays frequently at Choice Hotels when traveling for work, so their website was our first stop (after Tripadvisor, of course :) when looking for a hotel in Branson. We chose this hotel because it was a Platinum Award winner for their brand in 2012, and we were very happy with our choice! The staff was very friendly, our 2 rooms were clean and comfortable, the pool was wonderful, and the hot breakfast had lots of options to satisfy any food preference. This location is within walking distance to the Shoji Tabuchi Theatre and the IMAX Theatre, and an easy drive to Silver Dollar City. We stayed for 2 nights and would not hesitate to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms on a budget!”
Reviews.Author: Lampstand
Reviews.Content: I stayed here during a conference this April 2012. It was great to have a nice clean room on a budget. The complimentary breakfast was terrific. I ate outside on their patio on a nice spring day talking to some other guests. The location is wonderful on the west end of the strip. If you are on a budget, you will enjoy the nice clean rooms. The room even had a refrigerator, microwave and more. By the way, they have an indoor pool, but I did not use it because I was so busy.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Mary H
Reviews.Content: When we travel we use Choicehotels. We have stayed in a number of states and cities and by far this was the nicest Comfort Inn we have stayed at. It was very clean and well worth the rate we paid. The staff was always friendly and helpful. We would definately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: tudorrose05
Reviews.Content: Just stayed the last two nights at this wonderful hotel. First, check in was quick and easy. We had two rooms and they were both very very clean. The beds and pillows were both so comfortable. The shower head was great. The pool was the nicest I have been in. It is an indoor heated (yes, it feels heated also nice and warm) saltwater pool. Breakfast was very good. There were a variety of items both days. The woman working the breakfast room was very friendly and kept everything stocked and clean. I highly recommend this hotel and I look forward to our next stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Can't find fault with this one!!”
Reviews.Author: choiral
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay...clean rooms, great breakfast, close to all the best Branson attractions AND most of all the friendliest, most accommodating, genuinely NICE staff I have ever encountered!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Vic P P
Reviews.Content: As a retired hotelier, I was impressed with the staff. They are well trained and are genuinely interested in making you stay a pleasant experience. The location is very convenient to all venues. Would definitely use this property again.

Reviews.Title: “No Problems Here”
Reviews.Author: Pilgrim45900
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here a few days and we were very happy we picked this Comfort inn. The front desk was very busy when we arrived, but the check in was fast and smooth. They were even able to book two shows for us with no problems during the check in. I got a call from the front desk making sure we were happy with our room, nice touch. The room was very clean and keep clean every day we were there. The breakfast was very good and the girl that operated it made sure nothing ran out, which was a real job because the hotel was sold out and very busy. The pool was warm and very clean along with the spa. The location is nice with a Golden Corral next store. All the shows are close to the hotel. And, Yes I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Michael C
Reviews.Content: After reading so many great reviews on trip advisor I decided to go with this hotel, and I was quite pleased with my choice. I booked a 2 room suite, and requested an early check in and was told that shouldn’t be a problem. A few days before arriving I was pleasantly surprised to receive a friendly letter from the hotel which included a list of shows and times that they could book for me. When I arrived I was able to check in early as planned. I was given the Silver Maple Suite, a 2 room (bed room and living room) suite which included 2 separate full bath rooms, 2 entries, 2 flat screen tvs, a micro wave, icebox, queen size bed, couch with fold out bed, and a Jacuzzi. The room was very clean, comfortable and well stocked with various miscellaneous items. The staff was very courteous and helpful offering ideas of things to see and do in town. The pool room was also very nice, very clean, stocked with clean towels, the room temperature was very comfortable and the water was very clean, warm and didn’t smell of chlorine like most pools do. The hot tub was nice, not to hot; it seemed to gradually get warmer the longer you stayed but never to hot. On my 3 day I tried out the breakfast room, it wasn’t crowded; although in April Branson isn’t crowded either. They had scrambled eggs, sausages, biscuits and gravy, toast, waffles, yogurt, donuts, cereal, and juice. I tried the eggs and the biscuits and gravy they weren’t bad. The donuts were very fresh and really good. My only single issue with the hotel, which wasn’t even a big deal was the lighting fixture next to my bed, it seemed to have a short in the wiring and caused it to sometimes flicker, it was such a small deal I only mentioned it to the front desk clerk as I checked out, and she told me that she would immediately put in a maintenance work order to have it fixed. The maintenance man just happened to be standing behind her laughed and said he would check it out. I have nothing bad to say about the Comfort Inn West hotel, I was very pleased in every way from the room, the service, and the grounds, the pool, even the location of the hotel. I really liked how everything from the letter I received before my arrival to the courtesy note from maid service was hand signed with a name... it really made you feel like you werent just a number. This is just one of the small personal touches that I think sets this hotel apart from so many others in a good way. I plan on visiting Branson again, hopefully in October and I plan on staying here then and on all future visits.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, Excellent, Excellent”
Reviews.Author: loribells
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel! Excellent staff!! Excellent full breakfast daily! Rooms were very clean and comfortable. Staff was extremely helpful with booking show tickets and always had a smile on their face. I heard one answer the phone with "how may I exceed your expectations" and man did they ever! Will be staying here again!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: tinjen
Reviews.Content: We spent 2 nights at this hotel. Check in was fast. Staff were all very friendly. Our room was very clean and the beds are very comfortable. My husband even said he would like to take the bed home with us which is very rare to say about a hotel bed. The pool area was very clean. The pool is a large size pool, even goes to 8' deep. The hot tub was very large and worked great. The breakfast was good. They have a large variety of items to pick from. There were donuts, danishes, bagels, toasts, cereals, oatmeal, biscuits and gravy, scrambled eggs, sausage and 2 kinds of waffles. The attendant was also checking to make sure there was plenty of food available and the food area was clean. One thing to note about this property is the building are all "separate". This is not all under "one roof". We stayed in what was the main part of the hotel, there were 3 floors and this part of the hotel had an elevator which was very convenient. The other 2 buildings which are only 2 stories did not appear to have elevator access. If there was an elevator I did not see it. The breakfast area is in it's own building. The pool area is also in it's own building. So be sure and take some flip-flops with you when going to the pool because you will have to walk across the parking lot. The wi-fi worked fine. The were lots of TV channels to pick from also. This hotel is right by the Olive Garden and Cracker Barrel and across the street from the IMAX theater. I would definitely stay at this hotel again without any hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Inn West”
Reviews.Author: Lorinda M
Reviews.Content: The room was nice. The bathroom was very clean! The staff was friendly and willing to help. I felt very comfortable and safe on the premises.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: BJBall
Reviews.Content: This is the first hotel I have stayed in with a pool warm enough to swim in on a Nov. trip and a large hot tub that really works. The staff was wonderful. The breakfast had everything from waffles (even different flavors) to biscuits and gravy, sausage, and scrambled eggs. It was a great location (across from Olive Garden). Very clean and the heat and air didn't wake me up cutting off and on. Truly, a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Inn West”
Reviews.Author: KatyOmaha_Nebraska
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed again at the Comfort Inn West. Once again the staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and comfortable. The staff was very helpful at getting tickets to several shows for us. I would recommend this Hotel to anyone visiting Branson. Convenient to shows and shopping and dining.

Reviews.Title: “Super spa and pool”
Reviews.Author: Lou R
Reviews.Content: Very nice and quiet room. Spa/pool are in separate building and the water was cleanest of any hotel spa I have used. Also spa area is open late for after-show relaxation. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Very nice full breakfast, also served in its own building. Breakfast area can be very crowded--go a little later if you can. Easy access to the hotel without going through the heavy traffic of Hwy 76 downtown and you can also easily access a less traveled route to the showboat via Hwy 265. Easy walk from your room to Red Lobster and Golden Corral. This was my first stay at this hotel and I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect as usual”
Reviews.Author: junkcar
Reviews.Content: Second time here but this time I had to take my husband to emergency. The staff was very kind. All turned out okay! The room was well decorated and clean. They serve a delicious full breakfast. Everyone on the staff is friendly and helpful. Lovely place to stay and we would recommend very highly. Could I add that the landscaping is lovely and a nice place to take a little stroll. We highly recommend and we will return.............. Comfort Inn is on a hill so we had a full view of the city..it was lovely. Our thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: “Vacation for Two”
Reviews.Author: George B
Reviews.Content: My wife and i spent four wonderful days at this hotel and the accommodations were outstanding from the comfortable bed to the spacious room, friendly staff, delicious food, outstanding service we received from the time we checked in until we checked out we were made to feel like they really were glad we were there. We will be returning in the spring.

Reviews.Title: “Great room and service”
Reviews.Author: Donna R H
Reviews.Content: Stayed for a week in October; very nice. The breakfast is very good: lots of choices, good food at the right temperature, attendant kept the room clean and the food dishes stocked. Housekeeping kept the room clean and the towels freshened. Management and employees were very responsive to every request. Air conditioner / heater worked great, as well as the refrigerator and microwave. Overall, I would not hesitate to come back.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT KING SUITES”
Reviews.Author: Don B
Reviews.Content: We usually travel in a motorhome, so we don't always look forward to hotels/motels. This facility is different. A wonderful staff and a GREAT free breakfast. I swear they have the best scrambled eggs in town!! It is also very convenient to the shows in Branson and four restaurants are within walking distance. We had a one bedroom suite and it was perfect for our needs. A king bed, TV, recliner and bath in the bedroom and a sleeper sofa, TV, desk, fridge, microwave and bath in the other. Separate entrances from the outside provide real privacy when we needed it and a connecting door inside let us enjoy both rooms. They also had free Wi-Fi, which worked fine. I would highly recommend this inn to anyone planning to visit Branson, MO.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: Sherry H
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful experience while staying in this motel...everything was so clean and organized. The people were so friendly and helpful. We were there so we could go to Silver Dollar city and this location was great and so close to our destination.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay...”
Reviews.Author: okannie
Reviews.Content: We loved everything about this hotel. The saltwater pool was so nice for our hair and eyes. Their deluxe breakfast was filling with lots of choices. Our room was a nice size with microwave and refrigerator included and the beds were very comfortable. We called to make sure our room would be ready when we arrived, it was and very clean. We will stay at this Comfort Inn the next time we go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “We have been back twice this month!!”
Reviews.Author: Mike-Jane-Elijah
Reviews.Content: Tod and his staff are TOPS in evry catagory!! From management (TOD) to desk clerks (Denise) to breakfast lady (Sandy) and room service (Jennifer) we could not have received better service!!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel I've ever stayed at.”
Reviews.Author: John C
Reviews.Content: The Comfort Inn West was the best hotel I've ever stayed at. The room was clean and well decorated. The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. The full, hot breakfast was better than a restaurant! The cleaning staff was top notch. This hotel should give seminars to other hotels on how to do this right! Oh by the way, it was a tremendous value for the money to boot.

Reviews.Title: “We LOVE the Comfort Inn!”
Reviews.Author: Ernie-Sharlene R
Reviews.Content: They have awesome accomodations! Great breakfast, wonderful pool and hot tub, the room was clean and had a fridge and microwave in it. We moved to Branson years ago but we used to stay there regularly. LOVE the Comfort Inn.

Reviews.Title: “A Very Good Stay”
Reviews.Author: PLB50402
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed four nights at the Comfort Inn West and found the accommodations to be very good. It had the all the essentials that we have come to expect from Comfort Inns and provided us with good value for our money. Everyone that we met on the staff was great.

Reviews.Title: “Great get away!!!”
Reviews.Author: SerenitySeeker13
Reviews.Content: My friend and I took our kids to Branson, 2 fun filled days at White Water and Silver Dollar City. The location couldn't have been better and the staff was wonderful to us. I would recommend anyone to Comfort Inn West!

Reviews.Title: “Our new go to hotel”
Reviews.Author: bustercat47
Reviews.Content: Fantastic location and concerned and attentive desk staff. We were impressed with the breakfast room, how many have there own outdoor patios? A full breakfast with more choices than I've found in more expensive hotels. Location can't be beat, just off the main strip and close to IMAX. The room we had was very clean and the bathroom looked recently remodeled. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “We always stay at the Comfort In West when we plan a trip to Branson”
Reviews.Author: mac51334
Reviews.Content: We have always been treated very curtiously at the Motel. The staff has gone out of the way to meet our needs. The breakfast is excellent and the ladies waiting there are so down home and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Professionally Staffed”
Reviews.Author: trunkmonkey1956
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel on more than one occasion. It is always clean and well staffed. The people are great and work with you for any needs you have. Need a great place to stay? Look no further. Branson Inn West is my only choice for any trip in the future I make to Branson, Mo. I go there at least once a year.

Reviews.Title: “The runt of Comfort Inn's in Branson.”
Reviews.Author: REL62360
Reviews.Content: Compared to the other Comfort Inn's in Branson, this one leaves something to be desired. The pool was closed and no matter where your room is, you have to take a hike to get to the breakfast room and pool outside. On the plus side, it is within walking distance of Golden Corral and IMAX.

Reviews.Title: “Sierra Hotel-A Military Phrase for Good Stuff”
Reviews.Author: JoeUSAFRetired
Reviews.Content: I must say that we truly enjoyed our stay at this facility. The people manning the front desk on check-in were great...as well as on the check-out. ...The person changing the linen & towels came and went without a sign that she had been there...like a Stealth Fighter Plane...The lady running the Breakfast bar is doing an outstanding job..Everything was kept clean and well stocked...I liked the extra coffee containers so that there is a spare standing by while a new container is filled again...a small touch, but appreciated...no waiting for coffee to be made....choice of eggs, boiled or scrambled....and potatoes....And the waffles, Plain or with BlueBerries...she kept that area extra clean. People left, table was cleaned before they hit the door! In another life, I would have had her on an early promotion list. Sincerely, Lt Colonel Joe , US Air Force, Retired

Reviews.Title: “friendly and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Katy084
Reviews.Content: ,friendly and helpful staff,a nice breakfast helps you get an early start, clean and comfortable rooms

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded My Expectations”
Reviews.Author: Flyboy-2011
Reviews.Content: Needed a one night stay at Branson, MO and was surprised at this location by the attentive staff and the friendliness of the front desk and the hotel in general. Let it be known that this is not the Taj Mahal.....However if you want a very clean hotel that is genuine about customer service this little hotel is great. Check-in is was a breeze with a super friendly front desk associate, who did not mind giving us directions, ordering show tickets for us and giving us suggestions on what to do and see. Once in the room for 10 min. the phone rang and it was the front desk asking if everything was alright with our room....Wow, when was the last time that ever happened. Breakfast was hot and good and checkout was fast and friendly. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Made us feel very welcome”
Reviews.Author: tcla350
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel could not have been more friendly! The hotel has very comfortable rooms, including a refrigerator, microwave, hair dryer, and a magnifying mirror! It also has a great indoor pool and hot tub which our kids loved! Breakfast was served every morning. The location could not have been better... minutes from Silver Dollar City as well as very close to many other attractions in Branson. I would recommend this hotel, it is not the fanciest, but it was a great value!

Reviews.Title: “My stay was very enjoyable with a friendly staff and great location.”
Reviews.Author: vpianalto1
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay. My parents and I enjoyed a yummy breakfast every morning. We were also pleasantly surprised with a towel rolled into a swan on our bed when we arrived and a clean facility. The staff were so helpful and very friendly and the location was the best for the purpose of our trip with lots of eating places near by to choose from.

Reviews.Title: “No way to beat this hotel in Branson”
Reviews.Author: 11hotel11
Reviews.Content: The nicest Comfort Inn we've stayed in, and we stay in Choice Hotels all the time. I could be asked to rate any number of things about this hotel from 0 to 10 with 10 being perfect, and every category answer would be a 10. From now on when we go to Branson, we won't waste any more time shopping around for a hotel. We know where we're going!

Reviews.Title: “BEST PLACE TO STAY IN BRANSON, MO.”
Reviews.Author: Bassboatman
Reviews.Content: We drove in to the Comfort Inn late in the afternoon. The desk clerk clalled me by name and proceeded to complete my paperwork for the stay. He explained all of the features available, such as breakfast location, indoor pool and spa and made sure I knew exactly how to find my room. The room was spectacular and since it was sleeting outside the fact that the room was already warmed up was great. It was so quiet there i never heard anyone else arrive or any other noise even tough the parking lot was full the next morning. Breakfast was great with a good choice of what I like to have to start my day with. Lots of coffee with walfuls and cereal made the perfect start to our trip back home. Checking out made me a little sad to leave, felt like I was leaving good friends behind. I belive I have too. To be sure, I will stay there again and encourage all my friends to meet my new friends at Comfort Inn in Branson Randy Fowler 552 West Clearwater Drive Sheridan, AR 72150

Reviews.Title: “I would definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: ckmclements
Reviews.Content: I stayed here in November 2010 as part of a group. I could not have asked for a better room. The beds were comfortable, the room had a refrigerator and a microwave, it was clean, it was QUIET, and it was a great value for the price. I didn't bring my swimsuit, as it was NOVEMBER, but their swimming pool is in a warm pool house, so I could have! (However, the group I was with was a church group, and management was kind enough to let us use the pool area for our brief Sunday devotional service.) The free breakfast, also in its own building, was pretty awesome for a free breakfast. The one and only thing I wish it had had was bacon or sausage, but other than that, wow. I definitely did NOT go away hungry. There is a Red Lobster right next door. I don't have one single bad thing to say about this hotel. My mom says she hopes we stay here on this same trip again next year, and I absolutely agree.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great time in Branson at Comfort Inn West”
Reviews.Author: crbggb62
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Comfort Inn West in Branson was great! Desi, Brad and the rest of the staff were kind, cheerful, and helpful -- they went out of their way to make us feel welcomed, patiently answered our many questions, and took care of the paperwork to get tickets for the shows that we attended. Our room was very clean and obviously well-maintained. The breakfast is just about the best we've ever enjoyed. We heartily recommend Comfort Inn West as the best place to stay while in Branson. We'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Im glad I switched hotels”
Reviews.Author: ronkala
Reviews.Content: I had written off Comfort Inns after bad experience in April near Dulles Airport and had reservations with a competitor for a Saturday night in September. Then I noticed this one was a 2010 Gold Standard winner and just about next door to RFD-TV the Theater. I changed my reservations and had a pleasant stay in a very clean, quiet hotel with a satisfying continental breakfast. The hotel staff was pleasant and helpful in providing us with information we needed. The hotel restored our faith in the Comfort Inn chain and would stay here again. Oh, and the show we saw at the RFD theater, Brule', was absolutely fantastic .

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: hermam
Reviews.Content: The room was always clean new looking great place to and close to everything we did.

Reviews.Title: “Not quite the Gold Standard-but close!”
Reviews.Author: srehmann
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Branson for the weekend of November 5th-November 7th. I am not rating the value as we stayed for two nights on Choice Privileges points but I would guess the room rate should have been around $85-$90. I was familiar with this motel from location only having seen it in previous trips. It is a great location at the intersection of Highway 76 (the strip) and Shepard of the Hills Parkway (the red route). There are several entrances available so getting into and out of the parking lot is reasonably easy, even during busy times. The grounds are immaculate and obviously well maintained, lawns groomed, driveways clean etc. We arrived at about 5:00 on a Friday. Check in took a bit longer than I would have hoped. there were 3 staff at the front desk but 2 were on the phone and the third was helping with a ticket purchase. Other hotels in Branson have a separate ticket service area away from the front desk but here the staff was trying to handle both check in and show ticket purchases. One nice touch was the hotel sent us a welcome letter over a week before our arrival including a list of shows and prices. We had asked for a first floor room and one was awaiting us. That was really appreciated. Rooms are in three separate buildings and parking can get a bit tight but drive up parking by the room is great. We had a king room. It was clean and very serviceable but perhaps a bit on the small side. Since we were only in it a couple of hours a day it wasn't a problem but if you are going to be in it for any length of time I'd look for a bigger room or suite. Beds were comfortable and the hotel was quiet for sleeping. I was a bit surprised that the TV was not a flat screen but one of the older convex screen style. Channel selection was good. The breakfast area was well stocked but always crowded. We did not check out the pool area but it is in a separate building in the center of the complex. The hotel is a 2010 Gold Standard winner in the Choice Hotel chain. Overall it is close to a gold standard but not quite. On a scale of 100 I'd rate the hotel at least a 90. We would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “The motel was totally satisfactory, and in our price range”
Reviews.Author: Doniel
Reviews.Content: Clean, comfortable room and furnishings. We appreciated the thoughtful memo left for us by the staff concerning their appreciation and concern for us in soul and body.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Linda7144
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at Comfort Inn West in Branson, MO several times in the last 3 months. We love staying there. The room has always been clean and ready for us. Breakfast is fantastic. Check out is so easy. We plan on staying there many times in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: grannyx2
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Comfort Inn West in Branson Missouri in August 2010. I picked this hotel because of the location to Silver Dollar City. The hotel was clean and the staff was very friendly. We had Grandkids that went with us and they enjoyed the indoor pool after a long day at Silver Dollar City. The pool was open until midnight. The continental breakfast was very good and the server was friendly and very attentive to her duties. The hotel is located on the West side of the strip area and very easy to locate. It is a short distance away to other attractions such as Shepherd of the Hills and Table Rock Lake. It is close to many restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: wakkakitty
Reviews.Content: After reading many reviews, we decided to try Comfort Inn West. We were pleasantly surprised! It was after the busy Labor Day weekend, so things were quiet. The hotel is just off the strip but very quiet. Room was super clean and staff was very nice! The pool was clean as well. Our room was right across from the pool so we used it both nights.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: the_sd_dane
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this motel several times, and have always been very satisfied. Not luxury, but clean, friendly staff and a nice breakfast. The location is very convenient. They have increased their rates since spring 2010, so if you are on a budget, I think you can find cheaper lodging in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Momma62
Reviews.Content: A clean, friendly atmosphere. Very accommodating staff. WONDERFUL continental breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “A very Pleasurable experiance”
Reviews.Author: wprair
Reviews.Content: A truly pleasurable experiance with bonuses, The special make-up towel, very nice !! The full breakfast bar Very nice, Always Fresh and stocked , This was my ffirst vacxation in 3 years and I am very pleased . My fiance and I want to say "Thank You" ,

Reviews.Title: “We have stayed here twice this summer-three days each time and recommend as tops”
Reviews.Author: Mike-Jane-Elijah
Reviews.Content: My wife and I travel a lot throughout U.S., Canada and Mexico. The accomodations at Branson West Comfort Inn on Shepard of the Hills Expressway are very adequate and with their separate breakfast area and separate swimming area it is made even more enjoyable!! The staff at check-in/check-out are very cordial, professional, and friendly at all times. This was shown over two-three day stays. The breakfast staff and house-keeping staff are equally cordial , helpful and everyone there really gives you feeling they "appreciate you being there". During our most recent stay I complimented landscape gentleman and he thanked me with comment that "it takes lot of effort to keep it this way - but- the good part is I love my job here". We love to have folks who obviously enjoy their jobs and place of work to make our stay pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Motel with extraordinary desk clerk”
Reviews.Author: DUMAR41929
Reviews.Content: This motel provided my wife and I with very nice lodging ,clean room, good full breakfast, and most singularly a desk clerk that really went the "extra mile" to secure show tickets in a very timely fashion. This is only one of several Comfort Inns we have stayed in, and they are all of equal quality as this Comfort Inn West in Branson

Reviews.Title: “Good location and Clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: famof5iowa
Reviews.Content: We spent the last night of our Branson Vacation at the Comfort Inn West. The room was clean however the hotel itself seemed a bit out dated. Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. **Rooms were clean - however they did seem a bit dark. **Beds were very comfortable. **Breakfast area was very nice and new -- however very crowded when everyone was eating breakfast the following morning. **Parking was very limited when we returned to our rooms that eveing around 10:30 - - had a couple of boats taking up several parking spaces near our rooms so we had to park a ways a way . Overall I think this hotel was Average for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Atmosphere - Great Communication-Great Everything”
Reviews.Author: Debra84
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Branson and I brought my mother with my two teenagers..there was something for everyone. When I first walked into the Comfort Inn West I had a good feeling, there was fresh coffee and our room was right by the pool. The free breakfast was also great with a good and fresh variety. I saved the oatmeal for the last day and what a mistake that was as the oatmeal was really good! I look forward to staying there again next year!!! Thanks to the Comfort Inn West staff.

Reviews.Title: “Fair stay”
Reviews.Author: HUSKERTRAVELER
Reviews.Content: First of all, we arrived mid-evening and were pleased to receive the 1st floor room we had requested, and it was also very convenient to the pool and breakfast room. Hotel is conveniently located, at the intersections of several roads, in an area that gives easy access to many attractions. The pool and hot tub were nice. Hot tub was just the right temp. Majority of the breakfast, including biscuits and gravy was good, however, the scrambled eggs were nasty. Room was clean, quiet, and comfortable, although just a little bit small. It was nice to have a makeup mirror. Our only complaints are about small things, but they do add up. The air conditioner temp. and water temp. were both VERY touchy and difficult to adjust. The slightest turn of the dial made it too hot or too cold. It was impossible to attain the perfect temp. on either. We had a lot of trouble with our key cards not working. The clerk told us it was our fault for carrying them near credit cards or cell phones. Well, we stay in at least 25 different hotels a year and always carry our key cards in the same place, yet we only have this problem in every 50 to 75 hotels we stay at, so I hardly feel it was something that we did to cause the cards not to work. The maid never left us enough towels. We had to go to the office for more every day of our stay. We also ran out of toothpaste and asked for some at the front desk only to be told that they too had ran out. Now for a touchy subject that I feel I must say something about. Apparently, it is standard practice at this hotel to leave the Bible laying out open on the table with a scripture card on display. I do not feel that this was appropriate, as this is a hotel, not a church. I would not try to influence other people's beliefs and respect other people's choices. We do have freedom of religion in this country, and many people practice other religions. Some people may be offended by this display. Just having a Bible in the room should be sufficient enough. It is a personal choice as to whether one wants to read it or not. Overall, our stay was better that a lot of hotels we have been to. This was the best of the 3 hotels we have stayed at in Branson. Would we stay here again? Not sure.

Reviews.Title: “Robin & Ashley were the best we have ever had.”
Reviews.Author: bobenneking
Reviews.Content: From the time we called, Robin helped us with all our questions and gave us great information. Ashley helped us with tickets for shows and every one we went to, the tickets we there and they were very good seats. We just can't say enough good things about these two. If you are planning a trip to Branson, make sure you ask for Robin or Ashley. Thanks again, Robin & Ashley. Bob Enneking

Reviews.Title: “like our home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: Alvin_10
Reviews.Content: We come to Branson Mo. two times a year, For the past three years, we have stayed at comfort inn west. The staff is always ready to help with tickets, whatever we need, when we call for reservations we ask for a ground floor entrance, they always put us in the room at ground level even though it is a multi level motel.. the rooms are in the best kept condition, the cleaning staff does a wonderful job. Our room this trip had just been remodeled, new beds,everything new. The location of motel is perfect, very close to most shows, very easy to find, and lots of parking.. We will be staying there for many more trips. Alvin and Frances Sheppard Brookfield mo.

Reviews.Title: “Great accommodations, breakfast, jacuzzi, and courteous, helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: mahgnitton
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this motel two different years in March (2009 and 2010). It is built on a sloping hill so walk carefully on the grade. Rooms are nice and well maintained. Breakfast in a.m. is outstanding and should make anyone happy with such a variety of good food. Jacuzzi and pool, in separate secure building was nice. Jacuzzi is helpful for my leg circulation--so I stay for 30 to 60 minutes to improve the leg feelings. Our 3 to 11 p.m. crew (2010) of Andrew and Brian were helpful, courtesy and gracious to work with any needs. Stayed 3 nights and room recovery crew were thorough but not nosey of room contents.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, convenient location, good breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: cbier
Reviews.Content: The rooms and premises are very clean, and the staff is first rate. It is very quiet, even though it is right on the strip. The breakfast room has something for everyone. The pool and hottub were also very nice. All in all a great stay at a great value.

Reviews.Title: “I'm a man of very few words,Wouldn't think of staying any place but Comfort Inn West,Branson Mo. End of story.”
Reviews.Author: arkiehotwire
Reviews.Content: I travel many miles thru out the U.S.A. staying at many Motels-Hotels and I enjoy my stay at Comfort Inn West, Branson Mo. any time I'm in the area.I would rate them as being OUTSTANDING..........Don Richards

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC !”
Reviews.Author: Shepherdssheep
Reviews.Content: My husband & I celebrated our 50th anniversary & stayed a week here. Breakfast was good, GoldenCorral 2 doors down, pool & jacuzzi every day, close to shows,.....etc. Loved it & will return.

Reviews.Title: “great motel to stay”
Reviews.Author: hermam
Reviews.Content: The room was always clean with the bible open a pastage with meaning of stay. Will stay there again be comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel & location”
Reviews.Author: fty36
Reviews.Content: The Comfort Inn was easy to find & close to Branson shows. Front desk was a help in finding good shows & directions. The rooms are very roomy & clean. All the employees are very helpful. The the breakfast are great very good food & very clean. Will stay again the next time in Branson, won't check with any other Hotels. Would recmond to all our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: KatyOmaha_Nebraska
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this Comfort Inn several times and each time the service was excellent, the room was very clean and a fantastic breakfast was convenient. I found that it was easy to get to any show you would like plus the staff was willing to assist you in booking whatever show you would prefer plus assist you with directions and questions you had concerning Branson . A wide variety of restaurants were close and shopping was very convenient. I definately will be staying at this Comfort Inn in the future and would highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Our hotel of choice when we stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: redscorpio59
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff is always very helpful and considerate. The rooms are always clean, and the breakfast is always plentiful. This is our first choice hotel to stay in when we visit Branson. The location is perfect for whatever brings you to Branson; easy to get to, and easy to get to the shows, events, Silver Dollar City, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect wedding night. Clean room, welcoming staff, and great breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: littlebitblt
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for our wedding night and had a two room suite with a hot tub in the room. We came in late and the front desk had our keys all ready for us. Although the room was clean and big, we most loved the great selection and quality of breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “Great people, great room”
Reviews.Author: mscarla40
Reviews.Content: I have stayed many places throughout the Unite States, and this by far made my top ten list of excellent motel/hotels to stay when you are in branson. Its very close to all shows, outlet center, and great atmosphere. Staff are there to please!!!! A++++ place to stay in branson.

Reviews.Title: “We had an enjoyable and relaxing stay.”
Reviews.Author: LuvIA48
Reviews.Content: Very nice motel. Really enjoyed the breakfast accommodations and meal. Several food selections and enjoyed the fact it was in its own building. Rooms were very clean. Appreciated the welcoming message involving the Bible and verse to make our visit seem like home. Were please to receive immediate attention from housekeeping/custodian when there was a slight problem. Did not use the pool but thought it looked very clean and well-maintained. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean Room And A Great Value”
Reviews.Author: lafguy60
Reviews.Content: We had book a room elsewhere for our 4 night stay and only stayed at that property for one night and chose this hotel for the rest of our stay. The only reason I did not rate this property higher is that the Wi-Fi access was very spotty and virtually non-existant for us. Otherwise the room was spacious, well appointed and very clean. My wife is a fanatic about bathroom cleanliness and had only great things to say about this room. The breakfast is typical for this price point propety and the food was plentiful, even the one day we arrived within 15 minutes of the end of breakfast, and fresh and there was a good variety. Like so many properties in Branson this one is built on the side of a hill, so the driveways are steep and there are a couple of "iffy" corners so cauthion is required. We ould definately recommend this property and will definately stay here again when we visit Branson.

Reviews.Title: “We got out as fast as we could!”
Reviews.Author: egctwina
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled by the photos! This is hardly what this looks like! For starters, it is a motel, NOT a hotel, although they say that it's a "hotel"! The pool is not good. The breakfast was just ok....... . The room smelled and was not near as nice as the photos. The TV was old and the screen was blue and fuzzy. Definitely not worth the $!

Reviews.Title: “Vacation with the Grandkids”
Reviews.Author: grammydana
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, the grandkids opened the door and on one of the beds was a swan made from some of our room towels. The girls were impressed. Also, on our table was an open bible and a laminated card about visitors was laying on it which refered to a certain verse. I was impressed then! You don't see things like that often enough. The room was clean and well organized. The pool area was not too big, but served the purpose. It could have had a llittle more shallow end for a smaller child. The breakfast room was great! They had waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage gravy and biscuits, etc. We would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Place Ever.”
Reviews.Author: dozer417
Reviews.Content: This hotel is one of the best place's i have stayed.All the people are friendly and eagar to help.The hotel has a great location.They booked all of my tickets.I will be recommending this hotel to all of my friends and family.My new favorite place to stay in branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great room with breakfast, and helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: grammybasler
Reviews.Content: The staff was very hepfull in helping me set up my laptop for the internet. The pool was just right for my 5 year old. The room was extremely nice. Tthe breakfast was very good. There was a great selection, even for a picky 5 year old. I will stay her again.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: St_LouisCardsFan5
Reviews.Content: This motel has very clean and comfortable rooms, friendly and helpful staff and reasonable rates - close to Branson's attractions. This is our second stay and we highly recommend this motel.

Reviews.Title: “PLEASANT SURPRISE”
Reviews.Author: JERRYPN
Reviews.Content: My wife and I go to Branson about twice a year and wait to select a hotel until we arrive. We couldn't have been happier with our choice on this trip. We were treated in a most hospitable way for the three days that we were in Branson. The room was clean, up to date and very affordable. The indoor pool and suana was clean and relaxing. Above all the best surprise was the complete hot complimentary breakfast. All in all, it was a "pleasant surprise".

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: RoadTripTraveler
Reviews.Content: I disagree strongly with some of the negative reviews! I reserved three rooms and found them all to be excellent. We have stayed at some of the more expensive Branson hotels and found the Comfort Inn West to match or exceed the quality of all of them! The rooms were quiet, clean, and well-maintained. WiFi service was excellent. The complimentary breakfast included all anyone could want, and the breakfast staff was efficient even during the busiest times. The office staff was professional and friendly. This hotel is within walking distance to several restaurants, shops, and tourist attractions. This was our second stay at the Comfort Inn West, and we will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Nasty”
Reviews.Author: sheenakareena
Reviews.Content: We went to Branson for our end of summer vacation and found this place which offered a good location and from the reviews a decent room. They were wrong. When we got to the room it smelled horribly of mold and the toilet wouldn't stop running. I could also smell something that smelled like a wet dog. Not only that but we were told that this was a pet free place and I could hear a dog barking in one of the rooms. I called the front desk and told them what was wrong and was told that there were no other rooms available. Needless to say, we only stayed one night and found a much better place just down the road for a better price. I would avoid this place, it is a health hazard based just on the mold issue.

Reviews.Title: “Very Comfotable!”
Reviews.Author: goodtosea
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this wondeful hotel after a long day at Silver Dollar City. We were so happy with the wonderful service at the front desk while checking in and out. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. And, I must say that the bedding was so comfortable- something I never expect! I had the best nights sleep! I would definitely recommend this hotel- wonderful location, great service, very clean, quiet at night and very reasonable rates!

Reviews.Title: “Home Sweet Home”
Reviews.Author: purplepanthar
Reviews.Content: This was the best place to have a getaway with the kids. It's conveniently located to a lot of family oriented entertainment and theme parks. The rooms and beds are very comfortable. The warm breakfast is perfect to get you start on your day! A luxury hotel at a budget price.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location- Decent Room - Indoor Pool”
Reviews.Author: SalemsFortress
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is in an ideal location. Easy Walk to IHOP, IMAX, Red Lobster, Several Shops. I would say an ideal location for a family to easily access the best family attractions in Branson. It has a nice indoor pool. Several of the hotels, motels in Branson do not. The room itself was average, not great ,but clean and nice enough. The staff was friendly. Breakfast is in its own building and was simple continential but you could make a hot waffle IF you were there when it was not too busy.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay as usual”
Reviews.Author: mttee
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Comfort Inn West several times when in Branson and for the money, I would definitely recommend staying here. The staff is very friendly. We requested extra towels when we arrived and they were promptly delivered. Our room was comfortable and clean. Pool area was also very comfortable and the water temperature was perfect. Breakfast was pretty standard with make-your-own waffles and biscuits and gravy as the hot choices. Only complaint was waking up the second night to the sound of water dripping from the air conditioner and the carpet wet under it. The location is wonderful if you are going to SDC or Celebration City. Also very convenient to several restaurants. Overall, nice stay and will stay there again.

HotelInfo.Name: Comfort Inn West
HotelInfo.Address: 3601 Shepherd of the Hills Expressway, Branson, MO 65616
